page.title: 12EVERGREENS (2).
page.content: They also play cards,dominoes and bingo. Mr.Reason is the oldest person and he is {97 years old.}Some of the rules are .When moving in they are not allowed to bring in candles,gas or paraffin. They have got to say if they are going on holiday or out at night. {The wardens enjoy doing this job {because they like old people. } {Mrs Holtoft }does not do much in a normal day.Mrs Holtoft enjoys visiting her son and her daughter when she gets the time to get out.Her hobbies are {reading,knitting and {crocheting. }She plays{bingo and cards on Tuesday nights.Shes been there for {7 years.}She gets up at 9.00am and goes to bed at 9.00pm.She cooked school meals for{20 years}.She thinks the {wardens }are very friendly.
